activities: We offer a hosted Church Management System (similar to a Customer Relationship Mgmt application like SalesForce.com, SAP, Seibel, etc.) however ours is specifically for churches.  We store basic user information about the church staff so that they may access the data (username, department, contact info, etc.) and we store detailed information about the members of the church including the names, addresses, communication values, donation records, recurring donation information, etc.  All of the member data is available to authorized users at the church through an online, web-based, interface.  Users may also choose to run basic reports with this information.
